name: ms-appinsights.ReleaseAnnotation
description: Mark releases on Application Insights timelines.
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: applicationId
inputs.label: Application Insights Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: Id of the Application Insights resource that is monitoring the service that you are deploying in the release flow. Find it in the API access blade

inputs.name: apiKey
inputs.label: API key
inputs.helpMarkDown: API key to the Application Insights resource that is monitoring the service that you are deploying to. Find it in API access blade. Specify variable ApiKey in the Configuration tab.

inputs.name: userEnv
inputs.label: User environment, temporary for bug bash

inputs.name: releaseName
inputs.label: Release name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Release name, default obtained from release template run

instanceNameFormat: Add release annotation to Application Insights resource...
